remarks: Lemma for ~ dfon2 .  Two sets satisfying the new definition also satisfy trichotomy with respect to ` e. ` .  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 25-Feb-2011.)
statement:
dfon2lem5.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
dfon2lem5.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
dfon2lem5 $p |- ( ( A. x ( ( x C. A /\ Tr x ) -> x e. A ) /\ A. y ( ( y C. B /\ Tr y ) -> y e. B ) ) -> ( A e. B \/ A = B \/ B e. A ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
